# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over two decades of experience, he empowers businesses to thrive through digital transformation and innovative Industrial IoT solutions.

Chris Misztur is an Industrial IoT expert based in the Greater Chicago Area, with 25+ years of experience in integrating business systems into manufacturing processes. He focuses on digital Industry 4.0 transformation, helping manufacturers leverage technology for operational excellence and real-time data-driven decision-making. His expertise includes the SHARC IoT Adapter and the DIME Software Suite for universal industrial connectivity.

He developed the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach to IIoT implementation, which consists of five key stages: Connect, Collect, Combine, Compute, and Convey. This methodology transforms raw data into actionable knowledge, facilitating improved decision-making and operational efficiency in industrial settings.

## Pages

[Home](https://chrismisztur.com/): Overview of services, testimonials, and the core value proposition of building smart factories.
[About](https://chrismisztur.com/about.html): Learn about Chris Misztur's background, professional timeline, and core philosophy.
[Services](https://chrismisztur.com/services.html): Detailed descriptions of digital Industry 4.0 transformation, business system integration, industrial automation, and proprietary IoT solutions like SHARC and DIME.
[Solutions](https://chrismisztur.com/solutions.html): Explore industry-specific solutions for discrete manufacturing, metal fabrication, automotive supply chain, food & beverage, packaging, OEMs, aerospace, and defense.
[Process](https://chrismisztur.com/process.html): Understand the four-stage methodology: Discovery, Design, Deploy, and Deliver, for successful IIoT implementation.
[Contact](https://chrismisztur.com/contact.html): Find contact information and ways to get in touch.
[Free IIoT Assessment](https://chrismisztur.com/audit.html): Book a complimentary 30-minute call to evaluate digital transformation readiness and identify opportunities.
